animeTitle: Onii-chan Dakedo Ai Sae Areba Kankeinai yo ne! Specials
otherNames: Oniichan dakedo Ai sae Areba Kankeinai yo ne! Specials, お兄ちゃんだけど愛さえあれば関係ないよねっ
synopsis: Junior High student Nao’s brother complex is so strong, it’s almost at the point of incest. She’s determined to make her brother, High School student Shuusuke, see her as a woman. So determined, that she goes as far as going into his room to throw away all his non-incest related porn. But as she’s looking for his porno stash, she finds a photo album… and she’s not in any of his childhood pictures.
